text: tenine kahevamam avyum ke mahelamam calata raho, jyare teni'e mahela joyo to tenine hoja lagyo jethi teni potana kapada sametava lagi, kahyum ke a to kacathi baneli imarata che, kaheva lagi, mara palanahara! Mem potana para atyacara karyo, have hum sulaimanani jema samagra srstina palanahara allahani ajnakari banum chum
